entry.name: Disable Param - Network Test
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: disableParam_NT
Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.

entry.name: Talk Chr Entity ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: talkChrEntityId
Description: Used as a foreign key when referencing from a conversation.

entry.name: Eliminate Target Entity ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: eliminateTargetEntityId
Description: Entity ID of the character / group to be defeated by the buddy when summoned from this stele

entry.name: Summoned Event Flag ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: eliminateTargetEntityId
Description: Flag ID that stands when summoned from a stone monument. When this flag is set, the stone monument cannot be summoned.

entry.name: Is Special Monument
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isSpecial
Description: Is the stone monument an SP stone monument or a general-purpose stone monument? A bool that distinguishes.

entry.name: Buddy ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: buddyId
Description: ID of the buddy parameter. If "Special" is ○, this buddy ID will be summoned.

entry.name: Applied SpEffect ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dopingSpEffectId
Description: Special effect ID applied to the buddy when summoning the buddy

entry.name: Activation Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: activateRange
Description: If there is at least one character to be defeated in this range, you can summon a buddy at that stone monument.

entry.name: Overwrite Return Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: overwriteReturnRange
Description: Buddy's homecoming distance can be overridden

entry.name: Overwrite Activation Region Entity ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: overwriteActivateRegionEntityId
Description: The range where the buddy can be summoned can be overwritten in the area of ​​the specified entity ID.

entry.name: Warn Region Entity ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: warnRegionEntityId
Description: Warning area entity ID
